examples: She's a strong and independent woman.
The woman in the red dress is my sister.
Ela é uma mulher forte e independente.
A mulher do vestido vermelho é minha irmã.

suggested: Why did the woman bring lipstick to the courtroom? She wanted to make up her case!
The pervasive experience of sexism and misogyny can lead to feelings of sadness and frustration for many women.
Feeling angry and motivated to create change in the face of gender inequality and discrimination.
It can be surprising and empowering to discover the many historical achievements of women throughout history.
The scent of fresh flowers or perfume can be associated with femininity and womanhood.
The feeling of a warm embrace from a loved one can bring a sense of comfort and connection to other women.
The connection to other women and shared experiences of sexism and discrimination can be found in women's groups and support networks.
